official_title: To direct the Secretary of the Army to conduct a study to determine the feasibility of carrying out a project for water supply for Rialto, Fontana, and Colton, California.
short_title: Inland Empire Water Resources Preservation Act

summary.text: Inland Empire Water Resources Preservation Act - Directs the Secretary of the Army to study the feasibility of carrying out a water supply project for Rialto, Fontana, and Colton, California.
